game.description: Venture into the depths of the Hawkwood Dungeon by assisting Master Agamemnon in his exploration.
game.objective: Help Master Agamemnon explore the dungeon, retrieve the ancient artifact and safely escort him out.
game.reward: 5000 Gold Coins and Magic Sword of Eternity

tasks.description: Meet with Master Agamemnon in the tavern to discuss about the expedition.
Find and retrieve the ancient artifact hidden deep within the dungeon.
Safely escort Master Agamemnon out of Hawkwood Dungeon.

game.title: The Hawkwood Dungeon Expedition
